edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.app

Class WapServerApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.app.WapServerApplication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware

    @SpringBootApplication
 @ComponentScan(basePackages={"edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.service","edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.controller","edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model.formats","edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model.validators","edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model.rdf","edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.exceptions","edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.repository.jena","edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.app"})
public class WapServerApplication
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
    Main class of the application. It starts the Spring Framework and sets basic parameters like ComponentScan packages.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matthias Dressel, Michael Hitzker, Markus Hoefler, Andreas Loeffler, Timo Schmidt

      static long startUpThreshold

    • Field Detail

      • startUpThreshold

        public static long startUpThreshold
        When used during testing, we have to wait for spring to launch the app. This is the delay we accept as "normal" startup time
